spec_data.Name: texlive-francais-bst
spec_data.Description:
The package provides bibliographies (in French) conforming to
the rules in "Guide de la communication ecrite" (Malo, M.,
Quebec Amerique, 1996. ISBN 978-2-8903-7875-9) The BibTeX
styles were generated using custom-bib and they are compatible
with natbib
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:50:55 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Bibliographies conforming to French typographic standards
